body_html:
Yep, it obviously needs fixing.

The function expects the first string to start with domain_prefix, which is set to org.pytorch., and remove it from domain, that is org.pytorch.aten becomes aten::.

What would be your preferred option:
A. throw if the domain string is not prefixed correctly
B. remove domain_prefix only if specified and take the whole string otherwise

I'm leaning towards A.

body:
Yep, it obviously needs fixing.

The function expects the first string to start with `domain_prefix`, which is set to `org.pytorch.`, and remove it from domain, that is `org.pytorch.aten` becomes `aten::`.

What would be your preferred option:
A. throw if the domain string is not prefixed correctly
B. remove `domain_prefix` only if specified and take the whole string otherwise

I'm leaning towards A.
